ContentStructure.title: Please click SUBMIT after entering your name and use the playbar below to navigate the orientation.

ContentStructure.instance: WORKING WITH A CURRENT RISK ASSESSMENT

ContentStructure.title: Be sure to Click Submit after each question.  Advance by clicking Next.
Be sure to Click Submit. When finished, click Next.
What sections can be found in a Risk Assessment? (select any or all that apply)
Electrical Safety Investigations, Work Conditions, and Permits
You must answer the question before continuing.

question.title: Safety Orientation Exam

ContentStructure.title: Be sure to Click Submit. When finished, click Next.
Interim life safety measures shall be instituted when: (select all that apply)
When exits are blocked and emergency traffic is re-routed.
When fire alarms systems, smoke detectors, sprinklers, and fire pumps are enabled.

answer.title: When fire alarms systems, smoke detectors, sprinklers, and fire pumps are enabled.

ContentStructure.title: When hot work permits are not required.

answer.title: When hot work permits are not required.

ContentStructure.title: When vertical openings and/or penetrations are made through fire walls.

answer.title: When vertical openings and/or penetrations are made through fire walls.

ContentStructure.title: Be sure to Click Submit. When finished, click Next.
When shall an Infection Control Risk Assessment (ICRA) be implemented? (select one)
To determine if the medicine you’re taking may effect your work.

answer.title: To determine if the medicine you’re taking may effect your work.

ContentStructure.title: To ensure hazardous energy sources have been isolated.

answer.title: To ensure hazardous energy sources have been isolated.

ContentStructure.title: To ensure the prevention and the control of infectious diseases that are linked to environmental disturbances by construction activities.

answer.title: To ensure the prevention and the control of infectious diseases that are linked to environmental disturbances by construction activities.

ContentStructure.title: Be sure to Click Submit. When finished, click Next.
Before entering a confined space, the Supervisor must: (select any or all that apply)
Confirm that a valid permit is in place.

answer.title: Confirm that a valid permit is in place.

ContentStructure.title: Confirm that a qualified Attendant is present.
Confirm gas testing is carried out per the work permit.

answer.title: Confirm gas testing is carried out per the work permit.

ContentStructure.title: Confirm that it is safe to start work.

answer.title: Confirm that it is safe to start work.

ContentStructure.title: Be sure to Click Submit. When finished, click Next.
Identify what unsafe conditions would require a stoppage of work while working within a construction containment area: (select any or all that apply)
The sticky mat is missing or needs to be replaced.

answer.title: The sticky mat is missing or needs to be replaced.

ContentStructure.title: The seal around the containment wall (i.e. ceiling, floor, and walls) is compromised.

answer.title: The seal around the containment wall (i.e. ceiling, floor, and walls) is compromised.

ContentStructure.title: The HEPA filter in the work space is not working or the filter is clogged.

answer.title: The HEPA filter in the work space is not working or the filter is clogged.

ContentStructure.title: Positive pressure is observed on the vaneometer.

answer.title: Positive pressure is observed on the vaneometer.

ContentStructure.title: Openings are discovered in the temporary plastic or hard partition.

answer.title: Openings are discovered in the temporary plastic or hard partition.

ContentStructure.title: Please print this certificate and return it to the SLCH Facilities Department to receive your 2017 Contractor Safety Orientation Badge.
Congratulations!   You have passed the quiz!
